title: Navalny Was Poisoned With Frog Toxin, European Governments Say
summary_full: The toxin was found in the body of the Russian dissident Aleksei A. Navalny, who died in prison two years ago, five governments said, challenging Russia’s official account.
summary_public: The toxin was found in the body of the Russian dissident Aleksei A. Navalny, who died in prison two years ago, five governments said, challenging Russia’s official account.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Navalny Was Poisoned With Frog Toxin, European Governments Say
